Class UniverseInterface

Class that handles the interaction with the Universe part of ESI, and provides various helpful functions to other parts of the program.

| Improve this Doc View Source

ContractIdToName(List<Int64>, String)

Function that resolves the ids in a given contract, categories are determined based on the name of the field to which these ids belong. Results are cached and are available later from the IdToName() function.

Declaration
public void ContractIdToName(List<long> ids, string fieldName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Int64> ids

List of ids to resolve
System.String fieldName

Name of the field to which these ids belong

IdToName(List<Int64>)

Finds the names corresponding to these IDs, caches them and returns them as a list. Make sure all IDs are unique and of the same type.It is better to later query the IdToName(long id) method for the results, instead of using this list.

Declaration
public List<string> IdToName(List<long> ids)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Int64> ids

List of ids to resolve
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.String>

Name corresponding to the given ID
| Improve this Doc View Source

IdToName(Int64)

Overload for singular ids. If id is in the cache, returns it's cached value. Otherwise calls IdToName() with a List of length 1 containing this id.

Declaration
public string IdToName(long id)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int64 id

Id to resolve
Returns
Type Description
System.String

Resolved name
| Improve this Doc View Source

NameToId(String, SearchCategory)

For a given name of object and it's type, finds its ID. Doesn't require exact names, will find the closest match and returns its ID If no matches are found, returns -1

Declaration
public long NameToId(string name, SearchCategory category)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String name

Name of the object
ESI.NET.Enumerations.SearchCategory category

Enum describing the category of the object
Returns
Type Description
System.Int64

ID of the given query type/object
